navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, applications.jsp is processed.

navigation-case.description: Indicates to the NavigationHandler that the app_view.jsp view must be displayed if the Action referenced by a UICommand component on the greeting.jsp view returns the outcome "view".

navigation-rule.description: The decision rule used by the NavigationHandler to determine which view must be displayed after the current view, applications.jsp is processed.
